settings.heading: Prize Money Tennis Tournaments
settings.description: College Circuits is a series of open, prize money tennis tournaments hosted by college campuses. These events attract top players across the country and provide college players, adults, and high-level junior players chances to play competitive matches and improve their UTR Rating.

settings.heading: $2,000 UTR College Circuits Fall National Championships
Southeastern Louisiana Open Verified UTR Tournament
$2,000 guaranteed prize money
settings.description: The second annual UTR Sports $2,000 National College Circuits Championships in honor of Wes Fuller will take place August 16-18! This event offers a guaranteed $2,000 in prize money with a minimum 32 draw -- $1,000 for men and $1,000 for women. Singles only.

settings.heading: Prize Money Tiers
settings.description: The prize money tier for each division increases based on the number of players.

settings.heading: Prize Money Increase
settings.description: Prize money is only guaranteed if the number of players meets the Prize Money Tier qualifications.
settings.list: Players INCREASE prize money by signing up
settings.list2: REGISTER NOW if you're interested in any of the events below
settings.list3: Signing up early results in a HIGHER prize money tier so don't wait to register
settings.list4: If the event maximum permits, $500 is added for every 32 players after Tier 3

settings.heading: How the open, prize money tennis tournaments work
Watch: Why open, prize money tennis tournaments work for all
WATCH: WHY OPEN, PRIZE MONEY TENNIS TOURNAMENTS WORK
COLLEGE CIRCUITS EXPAND TO CANADA
settings.description: The expansion of UTR Sports College Circuits marks the first time since their launch in June 2022 that UTR Sports will create these open, prize-money tennis tournaments outside the U.S.

settings.heading: Interested in playing college tennis?
settings.list: UTR Sports has partnered with NCSA College Recruiting to help student-athletes all over the world achieve their dream of playing collegiate tennis. Sign up for a free NCSA profile and receive the following benefits:
settings.list2: Get noticed by 3,500 college tennis coaches
settings.list3: Meet with an NCSA expert for a free recruiting assessment
settings.list4: Receive a free personalized recruiting game plan

settings.description: College Circuits provide an incredible opportunity for everyone and anyone to play in a high-level event... I highly recommend college circuits to everyone.
settings.author: Hannah Keeling
settings.author-designation: Head Men's & Women's Tennis Coach, Georgia Gwinnett College

settings.description: These events create opportunities for our student-athletes to sharpen their skills through competitive play. For our program, hosting such events showcases our commitment to excellence and attracts talent to our campus.
settings.author: Maciek Sykut
settings.author-designation: Head Men's Tennis Coach, Elon University

settings.description: It is such a great way to provide extra opportunity for college and upcoming players. On top of that, absolute best way to meet and engage local tennis community!
settings.author: Sergey Avdeyev
settings.author-designation: Head Men’s Tennis Coach, University of Texas, San Antonio

settings.description: These events create opportunities for our student-athletes to sharpen their skills through competitive play. For our program, hosting such events showcases our commitment to excellence and attracts talent to our campus.

settings.heading: Join UTR Sports in 3 easy steps
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and pickleball and connect with players near you on the UTR Sports app.
